section.heading: Consolidated health district; compensation of board members

content.p:
ยง 398. Consolidated health district; compensation of board members. 1.
Members of the board of health of a consolidated health district,
whether or not members of a town board or a village board of trustees,
shall be allowed a per diem compensation of not more than ten dollars
for each calendar day in actual attendance at a meeting of the board of
health of the district, to be fixed and determined by the board of
health of the district and which compensation in the case of any member
shall not exceed the sum of one hundred and fifty dollars in any one
year.
 2. Members of the board of health of a consolidated health district
shall also be allowed their actual and necessary expenses.
 3. The compensation and expenses of members of the board of health of
a consolidated health district shall be audited and paid in the same
manner as the other expenses of the consolidated health district.
